name: dataset-viewer
description: Browse and analyze Hugging Face datasets with features like search, filtering, statistics, and data export

tools.name: get_info
tools.description: Get detailed information about a Hugging Face dataset including description, features, splits, and statistics. Run validate first to check if the dataset exists and is accessible.

dataset.description: Hugging Face dataset identifier in the format owner/dataset

auth_token.description: Hugging Face auth token for private/gated datasets

tools.name: get_rows
tools.description: Get paginated rows from a Hugging Face dataset

dataset.description: Hugging Face dataset identifier in the format owner/dataset

config.description: Dataset configuration/subset name. Use get_info to list available configs

split.description: Dataset split name. Splits partition the data for training/evaluation

page.description: Page number (0-based), returns 100 rows per page

auth_token.description: Hugging Face auth token for private/gated datasets

tools.name: get_first_rows
tools.description: Get first rows from a Hugging Face dataset split

dataset.description: Hugging Face dataset identifier in the format owner/dataset

config.description: Dataset configuration/subset name. Use get_info to list available configs

split.description: Dataset split name. Splits partition the data for training/evaluation

auth_token.description: Hugging Face auth token for private/gated datasets

tools.name: search_dataset
tools.description: Search for text within a Hugging Face dataset

dataset.description: Hugging Face dataset identifier in the format owner/dataset

config.description: Dataset configuration/subset name. Use get_info to list available configs

split.description: Dataset split name. Splits partition the data for training/evaluation

query.description: Text to search for in the dataset

auth_token.description: Hugging Face auth token for private/gated datasets

tools.name: filter
tools.description: Filter rows in a Hugging Face dataset using SQL-like conditions

dataset.description: Hugging Face dataset identifier in the format owner/dataset

config.description: Dataset configuration/subset name. Use get_info to list available configs

split.description: Dataset split name. Splits partition the data for training/evaluation

where.description: SQL-like WHERE clause to filter rows

orderby.description: SQL-like ORDER BY clause to sort results

page.description: Page number for paginated results (100 rows per page)

auth_token.description: Hugging Face auth token for private/gated datasets

tools.name: get_statistics
tools.description: Get statistics about a Hugging Face dataset

dataset.description: Hugging Face dataset identifier in the format owner/dataset

config.description: Dataset configuration/subset name. Use get_info to list available configs

split.description: Dataset split name. Splits partition the data for training/evaluation

auth_token.description: Hugging Face auth token for private/gated datasets

tools.name: get_parquet
tools.description: Export Hugging Face dataset split as Parquet file

dataset.description: Hugging Face dataset identifier in the format owner/dataset

auth_token.description: Hugging Face auth token for private/gated datasets

tools.name: validate
tools.description: Check if a Hugging Face dataset exists and is accessible

dataset.description: Hugging Face dataset identifier in the format owner/dataset

auth_token.description: Hugging Face auth token for private/gated datasets

prompts.name: Validate a dataset
prompts.description: Check if a dataset exists and is accessible.

prompts.name: Get dataset information
prompts.description: Retrieve detailed information about a dataset.

prompts.name: Search dataset contents
prompts.description: Search for text within a dataset.

prompts.name: Filter and sort rows
prompts.description: Filter rows using SQL-like conditions and sort them.

prompts.name: Get dataset statistics
prompts.description: Get statistics about a dataset split.

HUGGINGFACE_TOKEN.description: Your Hugging Face API token for accessing private datasets
HUGGINGFACE_TOKEN.title: HUGGINGFACE_TOKEN
